scripts.dev:clean: (lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 || true) && PORT=3000 cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server-start.js
scripts.dev:force: pkill -f node || true && sleep 2 && PORT=3000 cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server-start.js
scripts.dev:3000: pkill -f node || true && sleep 2 && PORT=3000 MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/rrdm cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server-start.js
scripts.dev:restart: (lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 || true) && (lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 || true) && (lsof -ti:3002 | xargs kill -9 || true) && (pkill -f node || true) && PORT=3003 MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/rrdm cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server-start.js
scripts.dev:port3000: killall -9 node || true && pkill -f nodemon || true && sleep 2 && PORT=3000 MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/rrdm cross-env NODE_ENV=development node server-start.js
scripts.dev:watch: killall -9 node || true && pkill -f nodemon || true && sleep 2 && PORT=3000 MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/rrdm cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch routes --watch controllers --watch models --watch views --watch server.js --watch server-start.js --watch config server-start.js
scripts.start:random: killall node || true && sleep 2 && MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/rrdm cross-env NODE_ENV=development node server-start.js
scripts.copy-govuk-assets: node ./scripts/copy-govuk-assets.js || echo 'Asset copy script failed but build will continue'
